QuestData.Title: Death's Door
QuestData.Description: Now there is an even greater threat from the Burning Legion. To the south is a portal known as Death's Door, which opens upon the horrific world where the Legion breeds its deadly hounds.$B$BTo get there, exit Evergrove by heading east up the ramp. Follow the path south, through the Bladed Gulch, Razaan's Landing, Razor Ridge and the Scalewing Shelf. Then, take the ramp down into the Vekhaar Stand and enter Death's Door through the tunnel, south of Mok'Nathal.$B$BOnce there, use this druid signal.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Druid Signal at Death's Door to call down and speak with an Evergrove Druid.
QuestData.RewardText: It is a relief that Wildlord Antelarion has sent you to us. The problem is much worse than first we feared!$B$B
